description: This file declares interfaces related to warning reporting within the WPEFramework project, including event and reporting unit control interfaces.

classes.name: IWarningEvent
classes.description: Interface representing a warning event with methods for serialization, deserialization, categorization, and string representation.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit
classes.description: Interface for a warning reporting unit responsible for reporting warning events and managing categories.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit::IWarningReportingControl
classes.description: Control interface for managing warning reporting categories, including exclusion and configuration.

methods.name: ReportWarningEvent
methods.description: Reports a warning event associated with a specific identifier.

methods.name: FetchCategoryInformation
methods.description: Retrieves information about a specific warning category, such as whether it's default, enabled, excluded, or configured.

methods.name: AddToCategoryList
methods.description: Adds a category control object to the category list.

methods.name: RemoveFromCategoryList
methods.description: Removes a category control object from the category list.

methods.name: Exclude
methods.description: Exclude a category based on its name.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configure a category with specific settings.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a copy of the warning reporting control object.
